DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether nutritional supplement effective treatment malnutrition pediatric patient failure thrive cystic fibrosis .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study With Enteral Formula With Symbiotic DHA Malnourished Children
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , control , randomize , prospective , parallel-group , double-blind study evaluate effect nutritional supplement nutritional status child failure thrive cystic fibrosis . Patients randomize receive either symbiotic formula DHA antioxidants standard formula .
DOC.criteria: Malnutrition ( P / T < 1 SD ) intake deficit without organic disease ( failure thrive ) / patient diagnose Cystic Fibrosis ) . Age > = 1 year . Stable patient No antibiotherapy last 30 day Inform consent sign ( parent/legal representative ) Patients allergy / intolerance cow 's milk proteins Metabolically unstable patient Patients metabolic intolerance carbohydrates Patients severe disease last 30 day
